text: Johnny Stecchino is a 1991 Italian comedy movie directed by Roberto Benigni (who also stars) and also starring Nicoletta Braschi, Paolo Bonacelli, Franco Volpi, Ivano Marescotti, Salvatore Borghese. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Roberto Benigni
title: Johnny Stecchino
